document.full_text: eastman kodak co did not infringe apple inc's patented technology for digital cameras, a judge at the international trade commission ruled in the most recent round of the companies' patent war.
document.title: itc judge rules for kodak in apple lawsuit
lines_and_colors: eastman kodak co did not infringe apple inc's patented technology for digital cameras, a judge at the international trade commission ruled in the most recent round of the companies' patent war.
